Text:
Hey ROKSTR, thanks for this, man. Just a thought... you're encoding at a bit rate of over 1500 for the video. No disrespect, but that is overkill. You could usefully follow scene rules and get the file size down to the low 300s with no discernible difference in quality
See http://scenenotice.org/details.php?id=2028
Honestly? If you really want to encode at 1500 kbps for video, you might as well up the image size to 720p. The overall result would probably be better, whether you played it at 720p or 480p size.
Not a biggy for me, since I have bandwidth. Just thinking of the brothers less fortunate ;-)

someone posted a 1.25 gig file of the Kardashians and it got hammered and still has 600 seeders so I don't think compressing the file a couple of hundred mb is that big of a deal on here This is how I get the file,I work 2 jobs, do this for the love of it and seem to be the only one upping the show so no disrespect but I think i do a pretty good job already

thats right brother...u r the only one...big thx for that......just keep on doing it the way u have been !
+ 1 rkstr
